title: maayai mayan (pada varNa)
sahitya:
mAyE mAyan sOdariyE manam irangAi
nIyE mahEshwari tAyE jagadambikE

anupallavi

paramana pAdamalar paNiya pArinil vandAi
karuttinil (v)urinai nirutti bhajikka aruL seivAi

muktAyi svara sAhityam

malar vizhi magizhum kalai vANiyO
yennai arivAi nIyE (amba) mAdhavan
nenjinil vAzhndiDum peNmaNiyO
mahESan meccum nIla vENiyO
yArenaikkAppadu ariyEn
rAjESwari bhavAni nIyE aruL purivAi

caraNam

SringAra sruti laya bhAvamE (v)ulaga nAyakiyE

caraNa swara sAhityam 1

sankaram tIrttiDa kaDaikaN pArAi yen mIdinil

2

konjiDum kumaranai guNamigu vEzhanai
koDuttanaL gowri manOhari
yen kulam tazhaittiDa ezhil vaDivuDanE
yeNNiyapaDi nI aruLiDa varuvAi

3

mAdE manamirangit taruvAi ippOdE
sakala kalaigal yAvum tandiDum dEvi nIyE
paNNiya seyalin palanadu nalamAi
palgida aruLvAi nIyE paramakalyANi amba karupporuLE kanivuDanE kAt taruLvAi
